Articles.Content: So I have been playing KSP for a quite while and just now thought about giving the challenges here a try. I'm so glad I found this game! Anyway... HI!
I was one of the first to see you, hello! How's KSP treating you?
Its really awesome, accept for that Kraken. I'm starting to experiment with interplanetary missions. That's kinda sad considering I have played KSP for about 1 and 1/2 years...

I've only had a single kraken in my couple of years playing this. Had to do with pieces of my launch vehicle going all ways after I jettisoned those. I now have debris traveling out of the system at crazy speeds. Do I care? Nope.
